statements.statement:
SELECT ROWIDTOCHAR( A.ROWID ) DATA_ROW_ID ,A.DFRD_BIZ_ID ,A.INST_NO ,A.NODE_NO ,A.DFRD_SEQ ,B.PROC_ST ,A.GUID ,A.PATH_NO ,A.TRAN_ID ,A.TRAN_DT ,A.TRAN_HEADER ,A.IN_DATA1 ,A.IN_DATA2 ,A.IN_DATA3 ,A.IN_DATA4 ,A.IN_DATA5 ,A.IN_DATA6 ,A.IN_DATA7 ,A.IN_DATA8 ,A.IN_DATA9 ,A.IN_DATA10 FROM DEVON.SERL_APPLOG_LG01 A ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATPROC_TB B WHERE A.DFRD_SEQ BETWEEN ${STRT_DFRD_SEQ} AND ${END_DFRD_SEQ} AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID = ${DFRD_BIZ_ID} AND A.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND A.NODE_NO = ${NODE_NO} AND A.INST_NO = ${INST_NO}
AND B.DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND A.TRAN_DT = B.TRAN_DT AND B.DAY_CD = SUBSTR(A.TRAN_DT,7,2) AND A.INST_NO = B.INST_NO AND A.NODE_NO = B.NODE_NO AND A.DFRD_SEQ = B.DFRD_SEQ --ORDER BY DFRD_SEQ

SELECT ROWIDTOCHAR( A.ROWID ) DATA_ROW_ID ,A.DFRD_BIZ_ID ,A.INST_NO ,A.NODE_NO ,A.DFRD_SEQ ,B.PROC_ST ,A.GUID ,A.PATH_NO ,A.TRAN_ID ,A.TRAN_DT ,A.TRAN_HEADER ,A.IN_DATA1 ,A.IN_DATA2 ,A.IN_DATA3 ,A.IN_DATA4 ,A.IN_DATA5 ,A.IN_DATA6 ,A.IN_DATA7 ,A.IN_DATA8 ,A.IN_DATA9 ,A.IN_DATA10 FROM DEVON.SERL_APPLOG_LG02 A ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATPROC_TB B WHERE A.DFRD_SEQ BETWEEN ${STRT_DFRD_SEQ} AND ${END_DFRD_SEQ} AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID = ${DFRD_BIZ_ID} AND A.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND A.NODE_NO = ${NODE_NO} AND A.INST_NO = ${INST_NO}
AND B.DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND A.TRAN_DT = B.TRAN_DT AND B.DAY_CD = SUBSTR(A.TRAN_DT,7,2) AND A.INST_NO = B.INST_NO AND A.NODE_NO = B.NODE_NO AND A.DFRD_SEQ = B.DFRD_SEQ --ORDER BY DFRD_SEQ
